A

AbstractGameObject - Class in gameObjects
Abstract class used to hold all the common attributes and functionalities that each of the game objects will inherit from.
AbstractGameObject() - Constructor for class gameObjects.AbstractGameObject
 
AbstractGameScreen - Class in screens
Abstract class used to inherit all the functionalities of the Screen interface
AbstractGameScreen(Game) - Constructor for class screens.AbstractGameScreen
 
acceleration - Variable in class gameObjects.AbstractGameObject
 
action - Variable in class util.Network.ActionMessage
 
addCardToGame(Stats) - Method in class game.WorldController
Creates a new card with his statistics given an places it in the cards hand
addEnemyCardToGame(Stats) - Method in class game.WorldController
Add an enemy card to the game
addNewCard - Variable in class game.WorldController
boolean used to start the animation of bringing a new card to the game
addZoom(float) - Method in class util.CameraHelper
 
alpha - Variable in class gameObjects.Card
Used to know when to stop the dying animation
animatedCard - Variable in class game.WorldController
Card that is going to have an animation
applyTo(OrthographicCamera) - Method in class util.CameraHelper
Takes care of updating the camera's attributes.
assetManager - Variable in class game.Assets
 
Assets - Class in game
Class to organize and structure our assets
Assets() - Constructor for class game.Assets
singleton: prevent instantiation from other classes
Assets.AssetCardHitPoints - Class in game
Class used to load assets related with the hit points of a card

Assets.AssetFonts - Class in game
Class used to load assets related with the fonts used to write messages on screen

Assets.AssetMusic - Class in game
Class used to load the music assets

Assets.AssetsCards - Class in game
Class used to load assets related with the game screen, specially cards

Class used to load assets related with the sounds the game implements

attack - Variable in class game.Assets.AssetSounds
 
attackCard - Variable in class game.WorldController
boolean used to update an attack animation
attackCardAnimation() - Method in class game.WorldController
The animation of a card attacking to the enemy
attackCardCommand() - Method in class game.WorldController
Checks if the player has tried to attack the enemy or an enemy card
attackCardEnemy - Variable in class game.WorldController
boolean used to perform an attack from an enemy animation
attackedCard - Variable in class game.WorldController
Card that is going to be attacked
attackFromEnemy(boolean) - Method in class game.WorldController
Method invoked to start an animation which shows an enemy attacking you
attackFromEnemyAnimation() - Method in class game.WorldController
The animation of an enemy card attacking
attackingCard - Variable in class game.WorldController
Card that is going to be attacked
attackingCardPosition - Variable in class game.WorldController
position on the table of the attacking card
attackParticles - Variable in class game.WorldController
Particles used to create a special effect when a card attacks

attackPoints - Variable in class gameObjects.Card
 
attackPower - Variable in class util.Stats
 
attacksLogic(Card, Card) - Method in class game.WorldController
The logic behind an attack that involves two cards, updates the hit points remaining of the both card and checks if they are still alive after the attack
attackSpecialEffect - Variable in class game.WorldController
Boolean used to render the attack special effect
AudioManager - Class in util
Centralized point of control over the game's audio playback.
AudioManager() - Constructor for class util.AudioManager
singleton: prevent instantiation from other classes
autoPassTurn(float) - Method in class game.WorldController
Method used to pass the turn to the enemy in case that this player takes too much time using his turn
